name: Flight of the Team
description:
Evil flowers and magical chocolates glaze the sky! The world's head people fortunately have enough jetpacks to provide for a small game development team. Take flight with one of eight Glass Robot Team Members and collect as many chocolates as you can while dodging dangerous flowers! 

    Use the Arrow Keys, a Mouse, or even a Gamepad to soar and get the highest scores!!

Controls

Keyboard - Left/Right Arrow Keys to Lean Back and Forth, Up/Space to Fly

Mouse/Touch - Simply Touch or Click in the Direction you want to Fly

Gamepad - Left Joystick - Lean Back and Forth, A Button/Right Trigger to Fly

Features
  • Created in the Construct 2 game engine
  • Side-Scrolling Flying
  • 2D Endless Gameplay
  • Character Select with 8 Different Characters
  • Online High Score Leaderboards
  • Mouse/Keyboard, Touch and Gamepad Support
  • Lots of Chocolate!
